ua.training.model

Class SlideShowGraphicFilesCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.training.model.SlideShowGraphicFilesCollection

  • public class SlideShowGraphicFilesCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    this is a main Model class of MVC pattern SlideShowGraphicFilesCollection is a collection, that represents list of GraphicFiles which can be RasterGraphicFile or VectorGraphicFile

      this constructor creates graphicFilesList based on @param pathToFolder contents
